item.title: Is Basketball Becoming a Popular Game in ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ India?
item.author: academyibsports@gmail.com (Ishwar Bhati)
item.description: Basketball is gaining traction in India, thanks to professional leagues, and rising youth interest. While not yet as dominant as cricket or football, its momentum suggests a growing fanbase and mainstream potential.
